title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 23-A
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 23-A
State Regulations

Exempt Acts include: 1. Any act, decision, or commitment required to be made within a specific time
limit set by law, rule, regulation or set by other legally imposed requirement
where such time limit renders impact statement analysis impossible. 2. Actions necessitated by emergencies
including, but not limited to: a.) Clean-up of flood and storm damage. b.) Emergency local assistance. c.) Accident clean-up. 3. Approval and execution of grants or
contracts for the rehabilitation, maintenance or repair of existing
transportation facilities or structures not involving an expansion of the
facility or structure. 4. Approval
and execution of grants or contracts for the purchase of equipment which will
be used to rehabilitate, maintain or repair existing transportation facilities
or structures. 5. All ministerial
acts including, but not limited to those listed in Appendix B of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app
23-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
